Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Application Gateway diagnostics to continuously monitor the health and status of the Application Gateway. Investigate any anomalies or potential issues.
Regularly update SSL/TLS certificates used by the Application Gateway to ensure secure communication. Verify expiration dates and replace certificates before they expire.
Periodically review and update Web Application Firewall (WAF) rules to ensure protection against the latest threats and vulnerabilities.
Check the health of backend servers connected to the Application Gateway. Ensure that all servers are operational and responding correctly.
Conduct regular audits of the Application Gateway configuration to ensure alignment with documented architecture and best practices.
Conduct failover tests to verify that redundant paths and configurations function correctly in case of primary path failures.
Review and optimize routing rules to ensure efficient traffic distribution and minimize latency.
Regularly back up the Application Gateway configuration to ensure recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Review and update security policies, including Network Security Groups (NSGs) and access controls, to adapt to changes in the network or security landscape.
Perform incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or Application Gateway outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Analyze traffic patterns and usage data to identify potential bottlenecks or areas for improvement in the Application Gateway setup.
Evaluate the SLA performance of the Application Gateway. Address any issues or deviations from the agreed SLA metrics.
Keep Application Gateway service documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Application Gateway features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Application Gateway performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
